Class AbstractKernelComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • kernel.AbstractKernelComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KernelComponent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AgentProxy, SimulatorProxy, ViewerProxy

    public abstract class AbstractKernelComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements KernelComponent
    Abstract base class for KernelComponent implementations.
